title: Installation issue: ucx build error
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install openmpi@4.0.5  +thread_multiple fabrics=ucx +pmi schedulers=slurm %gcc@8.4.0
```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.15.4-1702-ad87eec
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-haswell

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

compile errors were: 
```console
==> Installing ucx
==> No binary for ucx found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/a7/a7a2c8841dc0d5444088a4373dc9b9cc68dbffcd917c1eba92ca8ed8e5e635fb.tar.gz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> ucx: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> ucx: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> ucx: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

10 errors found in build log:
     682      CC       libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_iface.lo
     683      CC       libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_cm.lo
     684      CC       libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_ep.lo
     685      CC       libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_listener.lo
     686      CC       libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_cm_ep.lo
     687    rdmacm_cm_ep.c: In function 'uct_rdmacm_cm_ep_conn_notify':
  >> 688    rdmacm_cm_ep.c:129:9: error: implicit declaration of function 'rdma
            _establish'; did you mean 'rdma_notify'? [-Werror=implicit-function
            -declaration]
     689         if (rdma_establish(cep->id)) {
     690             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     691             rdma_notify
  >> 692    rdmacm_cm_ep.c:129:9: error: nested extern declaration of 'rdma_est
            ablish' [-Werror=nested-externs]
     693    rdmacm_cm.c: In function 'uct_rdmacm_cm_id_to_dev_addr':
  >> 694    rdmacm_cm.c:150:9: error: implicit declaration of function 'rdma_in
            it_qp_attr'; did you mean 'rdma_bind_addr'? [-Werror=implicit-funct
            ion-declaration]
     695         if (rdma_init_qp_attr(cm_id, &qp_attr, &qp_attr_mask)) {
     696             ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     697             rdma_bind_addr
  >> 698    rdmacm_cm.c:150:9: error: nested extern declaration of 'rdma_init_q
            p_attr' [-Werror=nested-externs]
     699    cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
  >> 700    make[4]: *** [libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_cm.lo] Error 1
     701    make[4]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     702    cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
  >> 703    make[4]: *** [libuct_rdmacm_la-rdmacm_cm_ep.lo] Error 1
     704    make[4]: Leaving directory `/tmp/cyrusl/spack-stage/spack-stage-ucx
            -1.9.0-4qndc3ygai52oxxdzpn2qbkjy54fw434/spack-src/src/uct/ib/rdmacm
            '
  >> 705    make[3]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     706    make[3]: Leaving directory `/tmp/cyrusl/spack-stage/spack-stage-ucx
            -1.9.0-4qndc3ygai52oxxdzpn2qbkjy54fw434/spack-src/src/uct/ib'
  >> 707    make[2]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     708    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/cyrusl/spack-stage/spack-stage-ucx
            -1.9.0-4qndc3ygai52oxxdzpn2qbkjy54fw434/spack-src/src/uct'
  >> 709    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     710    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/cyrusl/spack-stage/spack-stage-ucx
            -1.9.0-4qndc3ygai52oxxdzpn2qbkjy54fw434/spack-src'
  >> 711    make: *** [all] Error 2
```


<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

@hppritcha
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5459922/spack-build-out.txt)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5459923/spack-build-env.txt)

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
